metadata.title: CVE-2021-3748 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A use-after-free vulnerability was found in the virtio-net device of QEMU.It could occur when the descriptor's address belongs to the non directaccess region, due to num_buffers being set after the virtqueue elem hasbeen unmapped. A malicious guest could use this flaw to crash QEMU,resulting in a denial of service condition, or potentially execute code onthe host with the privileges of the QEMU process.

criterions.comment: qemu: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
